thread.section_title: Grasscity Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Grasscity | www.grasscity.com
thread.title: Austin

author: Austin
title: Austin
text: I ordered two acrylic bongs because I couldn't find them anywhere in smokeshops near me. Shipping was about 12 days which was fine besides the building anxiety to get the bongs! The bongs came well packaged and the package had no trace of evidence that it was a bong. Although one bong came without a mouth piece ring, it still works. Grasscity said they would politely send out a ring and were very sorry about it so it wasn't a big deal. Customer service was absolutely amazing and i'm super happy with my purchase. M
